text: Gu ntigem mbe mbarɨvi ndɨɨa rɨgi sɨgi pi ne suan za mbui. Mbe gumgi mbari khaŋ nzuai, “Nza za ndɨkndɨgi ki.” Mba kameŋ guigira. Gu khaŋ nzuai, kaaŋmbara khɨna muuŋgi tɨvi, mba tɨvi rɨɨŋrɨɨŋ ndi sui. Nza won ndavir harigi ntɨɨri ga ndɨɨi tɨv, nza muuŋgim, nza guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigir havhari ki.
